name: my-new-project
description: Test Automation Project With Webdriver IO
author: Mahbubur Rahman (Tom)

scripts.allure:result: npx allure generate --clean allure-results && npx allure open
scripts.clean:results: if exist allure-results rmdir /s/q allure-results && mkdir allure-results
scripts.test: npm run e2e:script || npm run posttest
